text: I’m a regex noob so this would be great, I just had to google how to do equals this string or that string `(foo|bar)`

In the same vain it would be great to have a multi image select option in Hubdb that created an array of images  in one column. With the potential for a batch uploader that would still upload to the file manager but would add everything from that batch to the array in the selected column.
Hey Jon - Thanks for writing up your thoughts on this! Diving into this now

Hey Jon - we’re working through redesigning the table editing experience, and the second thing you point out with regards to an accessibility UI feels doable.

With regards to the column width, I’m seeing that I’m able to use percentage values to set widths, and that the percentage values are being maintained after resizing the table. In case I’m doing something differently than how you are, mind shooting over an example set of steps I should take and a GIF that shows the issue?
